questions.title: Fanontaniana
questions.description: Lazao anay raha mamaly ny fanontaniana ny sary nomena

logos.title: Famantarana
logos.description: Tadiavo ny famantarana rehetra mifanaraka amin'ny famantarana nomena

eco_score.title: Eco-score
eco_score.description: Ataovy an-tsoratra ireo fanontaniana manana sanda ambony indrindra

account_band.title: Te hahita ny anjara birikinao ve ianao? Mamorona kaonty na midira ao amin'ny Open Food Facts!
account_band.contribution_details: Fantaro ny maha zava-dehibe ny fandraisanao anjara

contribution_modal.title: Zava-dehibe ny fandraisanao anjara
contribution_modal.information: Ny Hunger Games dia ezaka hampiasana ny vokatry ny OCR sy ny faharanitan-tsaina artifisialy. Rehefa mampiasa Hunger Games avy amin'ny Open Food Facts ianao dia manatsara ny angonay manontolo izay manampy ny vondrom-piarahamonina hanao safidy sakafo tsara kokoa. Angoninay ny fanamarihanao ary ampiasainay mba hahatonga ny Open Food Facts ho marina sy mahomby kokoa.
contribution_modal.thank_you: Misaotra anao nanampy anay hanatsara ny Open Food Facts mba ahafahan'ny olona maro mampiasa azy mora kokoa.

photographerCount.title: Mpaka sary
photographerCount.description: Maka sary ho an'ny vokatra iray

questions.label: etikety
questions.login_description: You are not currently logged into Open Food Facts. To get your answers directly applied to products, and associated to your account, consider logging in to your Open Food Facts account, or creating one
questions.please_wait_while_we_fetch_the_question: Andraso azafady fa haka ny fanontaniana izahay!

logos.task_description: Safidio ny famantarana rehetra mitovy tanteraka, ary omeo anarana toy ny "en:EU Organic" sy karazana toy ny "label".
logos.label: Etikety
logos.no_more_questions: No more questions about this logo. You can try to find more logos with the following game.

loading_messages.pending_reference_logos: Mametraka ohatra momba ny famantarana izahay mba hanombohana ny fikarohana
loading_messages.failed_reference_logos: Tsy nahita famantarana misy an'io fanamarihana io izahay. Andramo ny mampiasa ity lalao manaraka ity mba hanamarihana ny sasany amin'izy ireo.

deep_search.title: Fikarohana famantarana
deep_search.description: Mifidiana famantarana tianao hotadiavina, ary andao haka azy rehetra. Ho an'ny famantarana rehetra apetrakao dia halainay ny mifanakaiky aminy mba tsy hijanonanao manoratra. (Tsindrio ny Shift hisafidianana karazana famantarana)
deep_search.ref_logos: Reference logos (logo already annotated with this value)

settings.dev_mode_title: Raha te hahazo safidy bebe kokoa, ampio ny mode dev
settings.text1: Ny Open Food Facts dia tetikasa fiaraha-miasa naorin'ireo mpilatsaka an-tsitrapo an'aliny ary tantanin'ny fikambanana tsy mitady tombombarotra misy mpiasa 8. Mila ny fanomezanao izahay mba hamatsiana ny tetibola Open Food Facts 2024 sy hanohizana ny fampandrosoana ny tetikasa.
settings.text2: Angon-drakitra miara-miasa, maimaim-poana ary misokatra momba ny vokatra sakafo avy amin'ny lafivalon'izao tontolo izao.

page1.title: Tongasoa eto amin'ny Hunger Games
page1.text1: Hunger Games is a collection of mini-games that help contribute to Open Food Facts in many ways. You can play our really exciting games from anywhere. Here is a guided tour of the entire website which will get you started.
page1.text2: Make sure to login to the Open Food Facts website to get credit for your contributions. If you make a mistake, please take the time to correct it by heading to the website.
page1.text3: Raha misy fisalasalana momba ny lalao dia tsindrio ny sary marika fanontaniana eo an-tampon'ny havanana amin'ny pejy, ary azonao atao ny manatona anay ao amin'ny fantsona #hunger-games

page2.title: Lalao Fanontaniana
page2.text1: An'ity marika ity ve ny vokatra sakafo?
page2.text2: Valio amin'ny Eny/Tsia! Tsy fantatrao ny valiny? Tsy maninona, dingano fotsiny.
page2.text3: Azonao atao koa ny mampiasa ny hitsin-dàlanao amin'ny fitendry: y,n ary k.
page2.text4: Azonao atao ny sivana ny vokatra mifototra amin'ny firenena, marika, laza ary maro hafa!
page2.text5: Raha tsy te-hanao izany ianao isaky ny mandeha dia azonao atao koa ny mitahiry ny sivana amin'ny fipihana ny kintana. Rehefa miverina ianao amin'ny manaraka dia tadiavo ao amin'ny pejy fandraisana ireo sivana voatahiry

page3.title: Logos Game
page3.text1: Lalao malaza iray hafa dia ny lalao logos izay tsy maintsy mifidy ny logos rehetra tsapanao fa mitovy.
page3.text2: Araka ny asehon'ny ohatra, rehefa misafidy ny logo mitovy amin'izany ianao dia soraty fotsiny ny sandany ary safidio ny toerana misy marika, marika na zavatra hafa. Tsotra izany!

page4.title: Eco-Score Questions Game
page4.text1: Ampio izahay hamita ny fanontaniana sisa amin'ny etikety ambony indrindra!
page4.text2: These cards are linked to labels used in the computation of the Eco-Score.
page4.text4: Eco-Score captures the total environmental footprint, making it easier for consumers to compare products and decide which is better for the environment.

page5.title: Fikiràna
page5.text1: Mametraha fiteny tianao, ary mitadiava olana avy amin'ny pejin-kiranay.
page5.text2: If you're a developer, you can also explore our database content using our dev mode.

page6.title: Tour
page6.text1: Nihitsoka tany ho any? Te hanao fitetezam-paritra indray?
page6.text2: Kitio fotsiny ny marika fanontaniana ary atombohy indray ny dia!

page1.title: Selection
page1.text1: Safidio ny vokatra amin'ny famantarana iray ihany amin'ny fipihana azy ireo
page1.text2: Selected logos go to the top of the page, you can unselect them by clicking again on them

page2.title: Fampitandremana
page2.text1: Raha misy famantarana maromaro ny vokatra dia aza misafidy izany.
page2.text2: Raha ampahany amin'ny famantarana ihany no hita amin'ny vokatra dia azonao atao ny misafidy izany.

page3.title: Hanamafy
page3.text1: Indicate the type of logo (label, brand, QRcode, ...)
page3.text2: If it is a label or a brand logo, indicate which one it is
page3.text3: Afaka manolotra ny safidinao ianao izao

instructions.title: How to use the interface
instructions.chose_between_empty_and_partially_filled: You can chose between products for which OpenFoodFacts (OFF) has no data about the nutrients. Or product with partially filled nutrient table.
instructions.picture_date_is_display: The date of the picture is displayed on top of it. Allowing you to check if it's a recent one.
instructions.indicate_not_provided_value: Empty inputs are ignored. If fibers are not present in the table, you can put "-" to specify the value is not available.
instructions.validate_one_column: Fidio ny habe aseho eo amin'ny sary. Raha manana 100g sy haben'ny fanompoana ianao dia fidio azafady ny 100g satria format efa mahazatra izy io.
instructions.skip_button: If you don't know how to deal with an image, or you just don't want to do it, press "skip". Other user will be able to handle it.
instructions.invalid_image_button: If the pictures is not a nutritional table, press "Invalid image" to remove it from the list of the images to verify

notfound.nopage: Whoops! The page you're looking for can't be found.

nutriscore.label: Annotate Nutri-Score logo detection by batch.
nutriscore.description: Mba hanaovana izany, safidio ny sary rehetra mampiseho ny sanda Nutri-Score marina/diso ({{label}}), ary tsindrio eo amin'ny bokotra ambany mba hilazana raha toa ianao ka nisafidy napetraka marina na diso.

eco-score.description: Here is a summary of questions that could improve Eco-Score computation

ingredients.description: Ity lalao ity dia ahafahanao manamarina ny fisafidianana mialoha ny sarin'ny lisitry ny akora amin'ny fiteny samihafa ho an'ny vokatra iray, ary manamarina ireo akora nalaina.
